data.name: Water Me!
data.detailed_description:
GET INVOLVED

  • This game is in active development join discord to shape the game!
  • Earn special badges, achievements, and discounts!

Save the world one plant at a time

  • Some mysterious forces were involved in creating a sentient hero water droplet that could change states on command. Explore levels and find out your backstory and fulfill your destiny!

Meet the civilization of Dustys!


  • While playing you will encounter numerous cute critters that live inside of walls, Dustys, they will guide you and teach you about their way of living and the way plants are a huge part of their culture and lifecycle.

Level wide puzzles


  • The whole level is a puzzle! While you explore you will piece together how each level should look and what is the right step to save the helpless plant!

Collect plants and learn


  • Each plant you save will become yours as a card and digital plant, depending on your speed, exploration, or other criteria you will get different plants!
  • Unlock over 50 different unique plants!

Customize your characters

  • While playing you will collect various coins that you can exchange with Vendor Dusty and buy skins.

Build your garden city, share it, and play with friends online

(Feature will be added later)
  • Out of all plants you collect you can create mini garden city levels and play them online with friends!

data.short_description: Indie 3D puzzle-platform adventure where you play as a water and change states to solve puzzles, find collectibles, create mini garden cities, learn about flower cultures and save the world one plant at a time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Celeron G530 2.4Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650M or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements for playing at 720p@30fps
